entry.title: Blog development
entry.content: Blogging!This blog began from Oct 2018, which is the time I started my MA course. At early stage, I used blog to record some experiment and notes on seminar. It is a good way to save and share ideas though nobody ever came here😢😢, it is still a good place I can record my academic life. furthermore, I develop my Blog by Hexo framework, so I learn much knowledge about Web development. And I’m developing more function and style by myself, which real good for my coding ability and career. Let’s talk about more about my Blog construction, function, and future expectation. CategoriesCategory is important to sort post. I used different Caties(categories) to define different function of articles / posts. different caties have individual style and layout, and they have differnt content on index, which support clear information to audience or myself. JournalThis is the essential of blog, most post were defined as Journal, which carry general content, such as note, ideas, experiment, anything else. It could not be academic, and sometime will be post images. So, the layout on index can be divided as two style, preview content& image and abstract. galleryThis is a important class for a visual artist. It shows preview image on index for direct visual expression. Furthermore, the image can be clicked as new block, user can click button to change and scan image of a post. It basically is used to post my outcome or visual experiment. As the increasement of image, I found I might need more style to show differnt kinds of image, such as drawing, photography, vector graphic, motion graphic, video. They are definitely differnt, when I exhibit them, should I use differnt size / resolution ? Maybe. So I add some options in module programme, when code checked differnt type, it generate relateive layout. researchAs digital artist, I would like do research on computer, as well as experiment, so most recording and research article are saved on computer. Then I create this cat as my sketchbook, all of file or text / image can saved and post on research cat, so peers and tutor can easily relize what Im doing. Because it could be simple or short, sometimes massive text from copy and reference, so I decided to use Tag to abstract content of post as research cat. Which means, index only show tag of this kind of post, I and others can click tag to gain more relatvie information from same tag of post. It is a good way to expand idea horizontally. reflectionReflection will be academic when I post that. In future, I will add Grammaly or Translate API to help different language user to understand my article. On index, reflection block will show preview content and catelog and content guide, which means, audience can click a interesting Part / heading of content, and he will go to the sepcific postion of this post. By this way, audience could quickly understand what I’ve done, what steps I used, thinking process. Other expectationI’m going to develop a new cat which can collect ideas. Sometimes I used journal to record idea, but idea could be really short and shuffle, it can not be a article, and it will be burden(累赘) for index, if too many short post are displayed on index. That’s the reason I want to build a idea Page, in this page, all of idea will be grouped and showed, with relative tag, is it sounds really cool? I can shuffle these ideas and randomly scan them when I want to find inspiration. Maybe I can add some function to allow user select some words, and programme will use google search, and find some interdisciplinary research.

entry.title: Confirm a style in animated illustration
entry.content: Reflection: the feasibility of interactive illustrationWhat we didLast week, I and my collaborator completed the script of this project. As the first target we confirmed, we will do a project with narrative expression. Which means, we want to talk about a story. The context of story had been confirmed, Technology and love, as well as the content of story, the effect of technology to people and thier love, story can be separate as 3 chapters: they met they are in love they argued future We r going to show different communicate method in different period which be effected by techonology. In deeper meanning, we want to show the different communication methods. Communication can be seen as physical and psychological. When human develop their technology, and communicatino method, they could trend to communicate with physicals. For example, people seek speed and accuracy in communication, but forget the abstract / emotion expression. In this project, the abstraction expression could not be showed. We show shortage of physical communciation, we show affect of rubbish infomation. evaluateDo we successful in this stage? How good we did? To be honest, it is not complete good. Something good: I and my collaborate confirmed a good topic, which suit our common habbit and specialist field we complete a edited / coherence storyboard Our story have a steady point to express something bad: We have not confirmed the final format or work! We have not confirmed style of artistic 20 days left only 😅 Why?At early stage we want to combine Web and animation with a interactive way. Which means, audience can control / effect some elements when it motion. The question is, level / degree of control, how much user can move this elemnts, does it will be paused when user control it?, can user change the frame?, it is animation or PPT-style Web?. We are be limited by technic, therefore, this work could be become techinic-trend, that’s means the narractive / expression would be effected / limited by exist techinic, that’s not cool. HowTo solove this problem, we should understand what we want to say, and which way could be the suitest one. So, I list the specialist of different technic: format / attribute coherence flexibility interactivity reusability difficulty stylistic animation-autoPlay very good, even with rhythm can add color Filter No can be added on 3D model rhythm control vector rely, weak pixel motion PPT-like animation weak, stop animation high randomness speed of read image reusable low complexed allowed game-like animation very weak even can’t play ex, choose-base visuals ex, user effect narrative low programme-base vector mainly After I listed these advantages and disadvantages of different format, I thought, I can choose different method to express different range / chapter of story. Before I combine / choose a format, it is good to experiment at first, so next step I could make some samples, and we will discuss more about the effect of communication, and can different methods represent different technologies? ReflectionIn this progress, I knew the importance of a steady target of expression, which means, when we doing a project and we have many different option of idea / methodologies, we should choose one with our requirement or expression, the method can express the idea. So, in future work, before option choosing, I will conclude the difference of methods, and their advantages / disadvantages. If I have enough time, try it, then give answer, else list them, analyze them.

entry.title: Play with computer
entry.content: Play with computerIs computer fool? No, you saw Alpha Go, you saw the super calculator. But I say, computer is still a tool fool right now. It rely on your order / operation, sometimes even doesn’t work though. Well, let’s talk about some function it took me and the reason I thought it is a fool, then I will show some methods to deal with computer. Painting with computerAs a designer, computer supported sorts of methods to draw, whatever vector graphic, bitmap,or motional graphic. For painting, CG ^1 can imitate real textrue or materials even stroke / brush and press. Basically, CG can be defined Shaded & Flat (厚涂,平涂)for me. Shaded painting means artist will shade the graphic to make it looks more like real, object’s volume / 3D can be described as a objective effect. Flat painting have become more popluar than 10 years ago, this style gernerally use solid color and flat shape. Sometimes it’s abstract but has stronger visuals. Furthermore, in Japanese animation field, flat colours are filled into outline of comic, and make animation. Because frame should be drew individually, so flat color is the best way to fill. Animation and CurveHow to make a animation? By hand, draw every frames, which is easily understand. But different frames count in 1 second will take different effect. 6-7 frames/s obviously lag, for: stop motion 12 frames/s bascially smooth, for: general animation 24 frames/s really smooth, for: action expression / film 60 frames/s extremelly smooth, for: game It’s sooo hard to draw all frames by hand right?Well, we have computer now, so how can it help artist to make aniamation then. Key frames animationSet 2 frames, and computer will generate other frames. It looks wonderful, but, not at all. Key frames only generate simple transform: translate rotate skew scale For example, if I set two point, one is 0, another is 100. Then computer will generate graphic begin 0 to 100, but the graphic will not change except I set other animation. In AE, we can also use cursor to build motion, moving cursor of a graphic will make it as if it be pull / drag, because this action will keep the original shape, so it looks like a organic motion. AE expression 表达式Imagine that, you want to let 5 ball move to right from left, one by one. The first thing you might inspire could be set different location of cursor on timeline, so they begin from different time. It’s OK, but, how about 100 balls, you can’t do that right, so we use expression. AE expression is base on Javascript, we can use expression to get different values and set frames. transform.position + time * 100 * index transform.postion means this component ‘s current position time is the progress on timeline index is the index of layer This expression means this component will countinue move with time, and it will increase the distance with a higher layer. Bezier curveComputer is good at render geometric, but it can draw curve like human. So we should use Bezier curve to order computer to render a curve. Bacially, Bezier curve can render by SVG and P5.js or other language. And it can be sorted as: Linear Bezier Quadratic Bezier Cubic Bezier Different Bezier should be applied different handle point to control the curve. Quadratic need 2 points, cubic 3. To move the handle point, we can control the motion of curve. p5.js: shapeBegin() vertix(x,y); vertix(handleX,handleY); vertix(handleX2,handleY2); vertix(endX,endY); endShape() We can add more describe by add vertix() expression, it apply the coordition of a point to draw line. It is a good way to set point base on mouseX, mouseY, so computer will follow the user’s operation. If the motion should be set as automatically action, we can use frameCount , which will continue increase with timeline. Because the framecount will infinitve increase, so use cos(frameCount) to get a range of value from 0 to 1. If the handle point should move as a circle, we should get the function of circle, which return X and Y on a circle. let cX = x + r * cos(angle * PI / 180) let cY = y + r * sin(angle * PI /180) This is a function to get every point, when we set angle as framecount, this function will continue output coordinate of a circle, and we can use that to set value of handle of Bezier, it can move innifitve.

After every new generations, I added event listener repeatedly, which means when user interact with that element, it will response many times! The original method is: Array.from(.elements).forEach((t)=>{ t.addEventListener('click',function(){ ... }) }) To add EL for every elements, I chose a class, and set to an Array, so it can use forEach() to iterate (遍历). But, the existed elements will be added EL again, which is horrible..So I changed the method of add, I chose the last element which is the last generated, and add EL for it. The important thing is Selector. The SVG object can be chosen by CSS selector or DOM selector, so I would like to set attribute of SVG by Anime.js let cir = svg.paper.circle(x,y,r) //create circle element cir.attr({ class:'.cir-in-svg' }) // set class so it can be chosen by CSS/Anime anime({ targets:'.cir-in-svg', translateX:[ {values:100,duration:1000,easing:'linear'}, {values:0,duration:1000,easing:'linear'} ], opacity:1, duration:function(el,i,l){ return 500 + i*100 // el=targets,i=index,l=length } }) SVG can be set by CSS with a good performance and interactivity. The most important thing is : Set can not save same element const originArr = [a,b,c,d,e] let ranSet = new Set() do { ranSet.add(originArr[Math.floor(Math.random() * originArr.length)]) } while (ranSet.size<5); let newArr = Array.from(ranSet) So, the newArray is the new Array which is absolutely random.

entry.title: Research about M.Mohr
entry.content: Research about Manfred MohrManfred Mohr is a pioneer of digital art. I saw his work in V&A museum. His attitude for computer generated art is convincing and similar with me. As he said, I write computer algorithms i.e. rules that calculate and then generate the work which could not be realized in any other way. My artistic goal is reached when a finished work can dissociate itself from its logical content and stand convincingly as an independent abstract entity. Data and algorithms could be visualize, and computer can operate thousands of programmer to render the image that definitely hard to draw by hand. In addition, Mohr thought about the deeper form of digital art. His algorithms can render shape by particular way and create new composition of shape which means every elements exist in work could be different in composition and any other details. LOOKS COMPUTER COULD BE THINKING. Actually computer can’t thinking now, it merely doing something that have been set, but it can control variable to make every elements have tiny differences. Early work My early artistic work was influenced by atonal music, modern Jazz and abstract expressionism. As a consequence, geometry and the reduction of my visual vocabulary to black and white as binary decisions, took more and more importance in my work after 1963. As he said, he was inspired by atonal music and expressionism. It is really interesting, for me, music and expressionism both are emotional and abstract objects which are hard to describe by words or logical. But Mohr expressed these objects by computer, which have strict ruler and grammar in programmer. So, there is strong contrast in his work, because he used rational object convert to abstract information. Here are some early test of work and experiment of him: (Photo1) In this work, I can find his intention of express music and atone. To convey the unregulated and unordered tone, he drew some crooked border lines to represent tone in stave. I can guess it could the reason he used computer to draw random objects. In his drawing, I can see the difficulty of drawing absolutely random things, at most time we draw something with the order of brain, and the order generally is informative and conceive. (Photo2) This work showed a construction of lines. A nylon stocking is tear up and put on board. It shows different density of lines and negative space. To control the density of order, repeat and innocence thing can convey specific information. In 1969-1972, Mohr began to design algorithms to express his work. Image was printed by plotter which can be controlled by algorithm. A number of printer control languages were created to operate pen plotters, and transmit commands like “lift pen from paper”, “place pen on paper”, or “draw a line from here to here”. Three common ASCII-based plotter control languages are Hewlett-Packard’s HP-GL, its successor HP-GL/2 and Houston Instruments DMPL. Here is a simple HP-GL script drawing a line : SP1; PA500,500; PD; PR0,1000; PU; SP; This program instructs the plotter, in order, to take the first pen (SP1 = Select Pen 1), to go to coordinates X=500, Y=500 on the paper sheet (PA = Plot Absolute), to lower the pen against the paper (PD = Pen Down), to move 1000 units in the Y direction (thus drawing a vertical line - PR = Plot Relative), to lift the pen (PU = Pen Up) and finally to put it back in its stall. As we can see, early plotter has strict ruler and logical grammar. It should be given some order and parameter to draw image. data and parameter could convert to informative shape,can shape or words return to data? So it might be reconstructed and convey new means? In this idea, Chinese word could be dissociated to different stroke, pronunciation, stress and component which group up a word. In Chinese word, there are 4 stresses in pronunciation ruler, and most of character components (PianPang) have specific meanings, thats means, a Chinese word can be separated to be different words and meaning. Though it will lose the accuracy expression, it still convey part of original meaning and excess meaning. In later day, I would do deeper research about separation of Chinese character. (photo3) This work is made from vertical and horizon line, the horizon one is thicker so we can clear see that continuous line changed the direction. Actually the trace of line is random and controlled by algorithms. how long it go straight, how it change direction, when? The algorithms operate plotter to draw this image. It could be really interesting if we printed hundreds of it, the random walk of line, like a creature, smart and fool. (photo4) Random and variable can make complex composition, there are infinitive possibilities can be render, but the ruler is not changed, and the visual grammar is both same. In this point, the shape merely as a outcome, the algorithms could be art finally. A designer do not just create shape, it support a ruler, a model, a code. The elements are horizontal, vertical, 45 degree lines, square waves, zig-zags, and have probabilities for line widths and lengths.In each position on a very dense imaginary matrix, a sign is composed from 0-7 elements from the above alphabet.When 0 lines are chosen, a circle can be drawn having a randomly chosen radius and center. An image system in film could be made from similar elements, such as shape, structure and colours. entry.title: Screen Printing
entry.content: Screen PrintingThe induction of screen printing is really interesting for me. Though I contacted screen printing before, heres tutor gave us many useful information. Steps to print The first step is clear the table and prepare a laysheet. That’s the paper we would print as outcome. And we must bring original work. We should place the original work to comfirm the position we print on laysheet. So we paste work (it generally is acid paper) Fixed by tape. Than we fix film board on print machine so it hard to move. A little tip is fold a paper and paste on laysheet, so it is available to move and adjust to a right position though the sheet will be covered by film board. The ink should be adjust to be wet and smooth that’s means it will not dry too quick. To confect (调制) a good quality ink, we should balance the ratio of acrylic medium and acrylic. Medium should be put into container at first, because it can available acrylic mixed completely. 50% medium and about 10g acrylic, and tiny other colours if we nee d mixed colour. 其实就挤三四陀就好了。 To print well, we should print ink equality, DO NOT print overly, it lose all of details of engraving. The most important thing is that if we print a multicolour work, the position of laysheet should be accuracy place. We use first work that took mark with laystops to guarantee that. Why use screen printing?Screen printing is a technique that print something have original details. Though it could print repeatedly, every times printing with different speeds or force might make different effect. Furthermore, the making of film board could be hand drawn that’s means some hand drawn illustrations can be use as film, and print to different colors. Different with digital creation, the process of making film could have tiny differences between original painting, so it will full of unpredictable details that really gorgeous for me.

entry.title: V&A Classical digital work
entry.content: The arts of scienceWe are both rely on technology and smart devices today, and digital art or digital media have been really popluar in public sight. As designers, we generally use computer everyday, it is hard to imagine that how can I work when I leave computer. Did computer really support us to make incredible work? Is it REALLY VITAL THING in creation process? Or we merely rely on convient drawing or storage? It could make sence to understand early computer work and relieze how early computer artists thinking about art. In the early computer generated work, most of work could be made by mathematician or scientists, because they should operate complex progremmer on computer. Sometimes they did works with random shape or regular form, which could not be defined to an art work. If we focus on their process of working, we can find that they are trying to make computer to create something that generally repeat and change with some variable. As Manfred Mohr said, it is more important that develop a priori vocabulary which integrates the computer into the aesthethic system. As a tool, computer can make really fine image with actually a easy way. The more difficult thing is that how can we make computer create image as a CREATOR? That’s means computer should have the ability to create image that does’t create by hand. In fact, computer would ever create something from ZERO. It must opearte with some programmer that set by artist. In Manfred’s work, I saw some shape grouped with some specific method. These shape will be no sense if anyone out from group, and if they set in a matrix, we can see the visual grammer of work. Artist set a way that computer can create polyline and circle, and the quantity of point or length of line could be random, so every shape will have tiny differents but shows amazing variety. In this work, letters are printed as a strict format, like frame in frame. Computer always render some info from data bank by specific method, and the exsit of data could be visualization. Analyze the attribute or quantity of data, and render to more clear visual information. For illustration, artist could use tiny elements to make a bigger group, we collect different essential elements to imitate some situation and environment.
